code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NotesPanel=_ref=>{let{group,onSendMessage}=_ref;const[text,setText]=useState('');const handleSend=()=>{if(text.trim()){onSendMessage(text);setText('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notes-panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notes-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"avatar",style:{backgroundColor:group.color},children:group.initials}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:group.name})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"notes-body",children:group.messages.map((msg,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"note",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:msg.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:msg.timestamp})]},i))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notes-input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter your text here...",value:text,onChange:e=>setText(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSend,disabled:!text.trim(),children:"\u2192"})]})]});};export default NotesPanel;
